TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner implements class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner
Public Class XmlDataSourceDesigner Inherits HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner Implements IDataSourceDesigner
type XmlDataSourceDesigner = class inherit HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner interface IDataSourceDesigner

Docs.summary: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> class is intended for use by the XmlDataSource control, and not intended for use by developers of custom XML data source controls.

Docs.related: Extending Design-Time Support
How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Configure() cil managed

Docs.summary: Launches the configuration wizard for the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method is called by the design host, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property is `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data%2A> property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a block of Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) that defines an XSLT transformation to perform on the XML data that is contained by the property or by the XML file that is indicated by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Transform%2A> property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
